articles.author: Philip Berne
articles.title: I was wrong when I said you should never buy a Galaxy S24 over any iPhone - TechRadar
articles.content:
Mea culpa, I tried offering the Galaxy S24
 some tough love. I thought I was being logical, even right. Nope, I was wrong when I said every iPhone was a better buy than Samsung’s flagship S24.

articles.title: Big Tech in China: Huawei announces new AI innovations at developer conference - CGTN
articles.description: Chinese tech giant Huawei has announced a series of new innovations at its annual developer conference in the southern city of Dongguan. Huang Fei has the details.
